segments.text: Come on.Plenty of room upstairs.Fares please !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One to the beach . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One dollar ... I'm short of change this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry . I can wait a moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , here's your ticket and four dollars change .
segments.speaker: S1
